name: Drift Racing: Max Speed S Car
name_original: Drift Racing: Max Speed S Car
description:
Drift Racing: Max Speed S Car is an amazing drag racing and extremely challenging car drift driving game for players of danger. This car drifting game is developed for drift legends who love drift car racing in realistic and legendary drifting cars of the racing world.
Features

- High quality graphics and 3d race tracks
- Realistic drift racing experience with amazing physics
- Amazing simulation gaming experience with sports car racing for you
- Ability to choose different cars for drifting in the environment
- Free to play at anytime, without any restriction
- Smooth controls and accurate steering system
